name: Cell Life
description:
Cell Life

01/06/2021 - Fixed small performance bug :)

This is a tiny game, made in a couple of hours for the trijam.

I might make a more featured post-jam version.

This was made by me in under 3 hours (programming, art, and music).

Controls:

Control your cell with the mouse, the other cells are controlled by the AI.

F- Fullscreen

K- View Energy Bar

R- Restart Sim

Tips:

- Try to eat quickly so that you can make many offsprings.

- Some offsprings will have better genes, try to make them reproduce.

Trijam Themes:

- Micro Things: The game is about cells.

- Transformation; The cells can mutate into better or worse versions of their ancestors (I wish I had more time to expend this mechanic).
